job.title: Data Engineer (Remote!)
job.description: pWhat you develop matters At least we think so ppnbsp ppWelcome to Loka a remotefirst Silicon Valley Tech consulting company Were focused on AI and Machine Learning solutions  the kind that support interesting and meaningful advances for humanity ppnbsp ppOur vision is simple Every innovation ships We make this happen by working with elite performers like you We help you grow in ways that fascinate you so you can launch projects you believe in Were fortunate enough to work with missiondriven startups and Fortune 100s worldwide including Marriott Gatorade Dyson and CocaCola ppnbsp ppIf youre into growing with purpose and working with talented people in a healthy culture apply now  we might be looking for you to join our team in the US pbrstrongThe RolestrongullipWrite production grade Python and SQL ETL code in order to reliably and scalably transform messy customer data into internal format plilipCollaborate with Machine Learning Data Science Design Software Engineering and Business teams to triage data or ETL issues that are causing anomalies plilipAnalyze and find issues in the data and work to prioritize and find solutions plilipBuild out tests and health checks to ensure quality level of code and data plilipMonitor analyze and understand the data flowing through our system by adding the necessary visualizations and dashboards plilipBuild out scale up and deploy our compute platform running on Azure cloud infrastructure using Kubernetes and data platform powered by a combination of traditional databases data warehouses and data lakes that power our recommendation engine and ordering system plilipImplement reusable libraries and abstractions plilipProvide updates inform blockers and offer guidance to clients pliulbrstrongMain RequirementsstrongullipMUST HAVE Advanced level of Python and SQL plilipStrong problemsolving ability and ability to work through ambiguity and incomplete specifications plilipDedication to code quality testing design processesautomation and operational excellence plilipExperience wading through analyzing and working through large amounts of data retail and supplychain data preferred plilipGood communication skills You should feel comfortable having indepth technical discussions plilipBonus Spark and Pandas experience pliulbrstrongBenefitsstrongullip100 remotefirst We want you to have the flexibility to work where you feel most comfortable and productive plilipGrow with us 100 of Loka talent are eligible for skills development and certifications plilipPeople who promote and enjoy a worklife balance and workplace diversity plilipA healthy culture committed to equality with 5050 women and men leadership plilipThe opportunity to pursue what fascinates you for 90 days with something we affectionately call Loka Labs plilipHighly talented work teams with mentorship and constant skill improvement plilipAn environment that promotes transparency communication creativity and being proactive plilipIdeas valued over hierarchy allowing you to explore grow and implement creative solutionspliul
